description: This file defines a React functional component 'MovieCard' which displays movie information including poster, title, overview, rating, and watchlist button. It interacts with application state for ratings and provides UI for user interactions.

methods.name: MovieCard
methods.description: React component rendering a movie card with poster, title, overview, rating stars, and watchlist button.

calls: dispatch({ type: "RATE_MOVIE", movieId: movie.id, rating: v })
